name: Disconnected (Reb)
description:
Disconnected is a 5-10 minutes walking simulator made mainly as a test as my first game. 

I was a total noob with unity when this project started,  or any game engine for that matter, and now I'm a noob with some basic knowledge lol.

Big thanks to Adam DeLease for making all this possible. 

Credits

Concept & Visuals by: Reb

Programming by: Adam DeLease 

Music from: www.thedarkpiano.com
